## Average Wind in France 2007
```{r,echo=FALSE}
DF<-read.table("/home/ben/Documents/Coursera/Course9/meanWind2007France.csv",header=T,sep=",",dec=".",quote="")
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
WindMap <- DF %>% leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
    addCircleMarkers(lng=DF$lon,lat=DF$lat,color="green",
                     weight=1,radius=DF$meanWind,popup=paste(DF$Name,format(DF$meanWind,digits=2)," m/s"))
WindMap
```
Average Wind map for 2007 recorded at french stations height =10m). Data source: NOAA WMO Resolution 40
